mindmap
  root((Web Accessibility))
    Principles
      Perceivable
        Text alternatives
        Adaptable content
      Operable
        Keyboard accessible
        Enough time
      Understandable
        Readable text
        Predictable behavior
      Robust
        Compatible markup
        ARIA support
    Implementation
      Planning
        Audit requirements
        Budget resources
      Development
        Semantic HTML
        Testing with assistive tech
      Maintenance
        Regular testing
        User feedback

%%accTitle Web Accessibility Mind Map
%%accDescr A hierarchical mind map showing WCAG principles (Perceivable, Operable, Understandable, Robust) and implementation steps including planning, development, and maintenance for accessible web content.
